author: ngelzzz

text: Bubble #6 tl/n: Teru Teru Bozu is a paper doll that is hanged when you want to wish for a certain weather. When it is hanged normally, it means you are wishing for it not to rain. Hanged upside down, it means you are hoping for more rain.
author: ngelzzz

text: Tl/n: Meshi means food/meals. Itameshi is a combination of Italia and meshi.
author: ngelzzz

text: Tl/n: Meshi means food/meals. Itameshi is a combination of Italia and meshi. As for the French food, the kanji for France would be 仏蘭西. Following the logic of Itameshi, it takes the first kanji from France, which by itself means Buddha, hence Buddha Rice.
author: ngelzzz

text: Tl/n: Meshi means food/meals. Itameshi is a combination of Italia and meshi. As for the French food, the kanji for France would be 仏蘭西. Following the logic of Itameshi, it takes the first kanji from France, which by itself would mean France or Buddha, hence Buddha Rice.
author: ngelzzz

text: Tl/n: Meshi means food. Itameshi is a combination of Italia and meshi. As for the French food, the kanji for France would be 仏蘭西. Following the logic of Itameshi, it takes the first kanji from France, which by itself could still mean France, but it could also mean Buddha.
author: ngelzzz

text: Bubble #10: The fortune reading is basically done
author: ngelzzz

text: Bubble #10 extras: The fortune reading is the type based on the zodiacs. Each day the 12 zodiacs will be ranked with top place having great luck for the day, while the bottom place has the worst luck. This ranking changes every day, and people usually look at it in the morning before doing their activities. (a japan thing)
author: ngelzzz

author: ngelzzz

text: Bell Mark movement: basically bell marks are attached on various products sold in shops. if you buy something that has a bell mark on it, 10 percent of the purchase amount will be donated to the bell mark foundation and used to help people in need.
